meanings.meaning: so it is what it is

vlive.korean: 자기 그런 걸 모르잖아요! you don't know. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [CIX] ~호로로록 쭈와아아압 막내즈의 우당탕탕 무국물 마시기~ (JINYOUNG&HYUNSUK drinking chicken radish soup)
그런 걸 해본 적 있어요? Have you ever done that? 듣기 View video iKON : live
기억력 좋다 - 그게 맞는 건지 모르겠어요 - 그런 걸 기억해? Good memory. - I'm not sure. - You remember that? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : 캐럿들~💎💖💙
vlive.english: Good memory. - I'm not sure. - You remember that?

vlive.korean: 그런 거를 이렇게 표현한 것 같아요 - 그런 걸 표현했다고요? And that scene describes it well. - You think it's for that? 듣기 View video iKON : [Replay] iKON ‘i DECIDE’ COUNTDOWN LIVE
vlive.english: And that scene describes it well. - You think it's for that?

vlive.korean: 그리고 그런 걸... So... Things like that... 듣기 View video WINNER : 사랑

examples.korean: Ugh! How can you eat that stuff? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 윽! 넌 그런 걸 어떻게 먹을 수가 있니? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Ugh! How can you eat that stuff? Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I know it’s not ideal but there you go… 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그게 이상적이 아니란 건 알아, 하지만 사정이 그런 걸… Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I know it’s not ideal but there you go… Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: ‘Thanks for everything.’ ‘Hey, no sweat!’ 듣기 Add to Wordbook “모든 게 다 고마워.” “에이, 뭘 그런 걸 갖고 그래!” Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘Thanks for everything.’ ‘Hey, no sweat!’ Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It’s amazing how ungrateful some people are, even after you go out of your way to help them. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 자기를 도와주느라 남은 정말 고생했는데, 그런 걸 고마워할 줄 모르는 사람들을 보면 놀라워. DARAKWON
examples.english: It’s amazing how ungrateful some people are, even after you go out of your way to help them. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Why should I buy expensive art when I can make my own. (Piero Milani) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나 스스로 비싼 예술작품을 만들어 낼 수 있는데 굳이 뭐하러 그런 걸 사야 합니까. (피에로 밀라니, 예술명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: Why should I buy expensive art when I can make my own. (Piero Milani) Add to Wordbook
